Verses: 1 pinbu Kaikkolukku Oppaana Orualavukol Ennidaththil Kodukkappattadhu. Appozhudhu Dhevadhoodhan Nindru, Ennai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththaiyum, Balipeedaththaiyum Adhil Thozhudhukollugiravargalaiyum Alandhupaar.
2 aalayaththirkup Purambe Irukkirapiragaaram Purajaadhiyaarukkuk Kodukkappattapadiyaal Adhai Alavaamal Purampaakkippodu; Parisuththa Nagaraththai Avargal Naarpaththirandu Maadhamalavum Midhippaargal.
3 ennudaiya Irandu Saatchigalum Irattu Vasthiramuduththikkondirukkiravargalaai, Aayiraththirunootrarupadhu Naalalavum Theerkkadharisananjollumpadi Avargalukku Adhigaaram Koduppen.
4 poologaththin Aandavarukku Munbaaga Nirkira Irandu Olivamarangalum Irandu Vilakkuththandugalum Ivargale.

5 oruvan Avargalaich Sedhappaduththamanadhaayirundhaal, Avargaludaiya Vaayilirundhu Akkini Purappattu, Avargaludaiya Saththurukkalaip Patchikkum; Avargalaich Sedhappaduththa Manadhaayirukkiravan Evano Avan Appadiye Kollappadavendum.

6 avargal Theerkkadharisananj Sollivarugira Naatkalile Mazhaipeyyaadhapadikku Vaanaththai Adaikka Avargalukku Adhigaaramundu; Avargal Thanneergalai Raththamaaga Maatravum, Thangalukku Vendumpodhellaam Boomiyaisagalavidha Vaadhaigalaalum Vaadhikkavum Avargalukku Adhikaaramundu.
7 avargal Thangal Saatchiyaisolli Mudiththirukkumpodhu, Paadhaalaththilirundherugira Mirugam Avargalode Yuththampanni, Avargalai Jeyiththu, Avargalaik Kondrupodum.

8 avargaludaiya Udalgal Magaa Nagaraththin Visaalamaana Veedhiyile Kidakkum. Andha Nagaram Sodhom Endrum Egipdhu Endrum Gnaanaarththamaaich Sollappadum; Adhile Nammudaiya Karththarum Siluvaiyile Araiyappattaar.
9 janangalilum, Koththirangalilum, Baashaikkaararilum, Jaadhigalilumullavargal Avargaludaiya Udalgalai Moondrarai Naal Varaikkum Paarppaargal, Avargaludaiya Udalgalaik Kallaraigalil Vaikkavottaargal.

10 avvirandu Theerkkadharisigalum Boomiyin Kudigalai Vedhanaippaduththinapadiyaal Avargal Nimiththam Boomiyil Kudiyirukkiravargal Sandhoshappattuk Kalikoorndhu, Oruvarukkoruvar Vegumadhigalai Anuppuvaargal.
11 moondrarai Naalaikkuppinbu Dhevanidaththilirundhu Jeevaaavi Avargalukkul Piravesiththadhu, Appozhudhu Avargal Kaaloondri Nindraargal; Avargalaip Paarththavargalukku Migundha Bayamundaayitru.
12 inge Erivaarungal Endru Vaanaththilirundhu Thangalukku Undaana Periya Saththaththai Avargal Kettu, Megaththil Eri Vaanaththirkup Ponaargal, Avargaludaiya Saththurukkal Avargalaip Paarththaargal.

13 anneraththile Boomi Migavum Adhirndhadhu, Udane Andha Nagaraththil Paththilorupangu Idindhu Vizhundhadhu; Manusharil Ezhaayiramper Boomiyadhirchchiyinaal Azhindhaargal; Meedhiyaanavargal Bayamadaindhu Paralogaththin Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal.
14 irandaam Aabaththu Kadandhupoyitru; Idho, Moondraam Aabaththu Seekkiramaai Varugiradhu.

15 ezhaam Thoodhan Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Ulagaththin Raajyangal Nammudaiya Karththarukkum, Avarudaiya Kiristhuvukkumuriya Raajyangalaayina; Avar Sadhaakaalangalilum Raajyapaaram Pannuvaar Ennum Kembeera Saththangal Vaanaththil Undaayina.
16 appozhudhu Dhevanukku Munbaagath Thangal Singaasanangalmel Utkaarndhirundha Irubaththunaangu Mooppargalum Muganguppura Vizhundhu:
17 irukkiravarum Irundhavarum Varugiravarumaagiya Sarvavallamaiyulla Karththaraagiya Dhevane, Ummai Sthoththirikkirom, Dhevareer Umadhu Magaa Vallamaiyaikkondu Raajyabaarampannugireer.

18 jaadhigal Kobiththaargal, Appozhudhu Ummudaiya Kobam Moondadhu; Mariththor Niyaayaththeerppadaigiradharkum, Theerkkadharisigalaagiya Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukkum Parisuththavaangalukkum Umadhu Naamaththinmel Bayabakdhiyaayirundha Siriyor Periyorukkum Balanalikkiradharkum, Boomiyaik Keduththavargalaik Kedukkiradharkum, Kaalamvandhadhu Endru Solli, Dhevanaith Thozhudhukondaargal.

19 appozhudhu Paralogaththil Dhevanudaiya Aalayam Thirakkappattadhu, Avarudaiya Aalayaththile Avarudaiya Udanpadikkaiyin Petti Kaanappattadhu; Appozhudhu Minnalgalum, Saththangalum, Idimuzhakkangalum, Boomiyadhirchchiyum, Perungalmazhaiyum Undaayina.
